long_description: Incredibly lightweight and easy to put on over your bike jersey or jacket, the Nathan Cyclotier Reflective Vest delivers high reflectivity to increase your visibility to traffic in low light. Made from soft, breathable mesh and reflective material that allows you to be seen from any angle. Cycling-specific design ensures a great fit. Extended tail offers coverage in the bent-over cycling position; reflective strap keepers keep the adjustable side straps from flapping in the wind. Horizontal opening across back allows easy access to your bike jersey pockets. Zippered pocket stores small items. The Nathan Cyclotier Reflective Vest can be adjusted to fine-tune the fit; 1 size fits most.
short_description: Incredibly lightweight and easy to put on over your bike jersey or jacket, the Nathan Cyclotier Reflective Vest delivers high reflectivity to increase your visibility to traffic in low light.
